meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Chuck Ettelson Beau Henson Margie Cohen Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6342.

td.p: Chuck Ettelson, a plastic surgeon from St. Louis, Missouri
Beau Henson, a test prep teacher and actor originally from Mt. Carmel, Illinois
Margie Cohen, a litigator from Houston, Texas (whose 1-day cash winnings total $6,199)

tr.td: 2010s TV
QUOTATIONS
ADLER-TIZING
GRAPHIC DESIGN
ANIMALS IN CHILDREN'S BOOKS
DOUBLE M
